column1: Ilmandur was supposed to be eldest of the three sons of Elendil
column2: who only appears in the third version of the manuscript of "The Council of Elrond" where Elrond tells how the sons of Elendil governed  the three cities of Gondor
column3: but Tolkien struck out the name in pencil.

column2: Ilmandur was probably meant to be the lord of Osgiliath
column3: as Ilmen in his name means the realm of stars
